```{r setup}
#| include: false
options(scipen = 999)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(broom)
library(scales)
library(sf)

boston <- read_csv("./data/boston.csv")
boston.sf <- boston %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("Longitude", "Latitude"), crs = 4326) %>%
  st_transform('ESRI:102286')  # MA State Plane (feet)

boston.sf <- boston.sf %>%
  mutate(has_ac = case_when(R_AC != 'N' ~ 1, .default = 0)) 

nhoods <- st_read("./data/BPDA_Neighborhood_Boundaries.geojson") %>%
  st_transform('ESRI:102286')

boston.sf <- boston.sf %>%
  st_join(nhoods, join = st_intersects)

model <- lm(SalePrice ~ has_ac * LivingArea, data = boston.sf)

summary(model)

```
